challenges.paragraph: The desert is a vast and {arid} place. There is very little water, and not many plants can grow in the dry soil.
challenges.definition: Having little or no rain; too dry or barren to support vegetation.

mcq_synonym.question: Which word is a synonym for arid?

challenges.paragraph: After running the marathon, the athlete was completely {exhausted}. He could barely stand up and needed to rest for a long time.

mcq_synonym.question: Which word means the same as exhausted?

challenges.paragraph: The old library was full of {ancient} books. Some of them were hundreds of years old and had to be handled very carefully.
challenges.definition: Belonging to the very distant past and no longer in existence.

mcq_synonym.question: Which word is a synonym for ancient?
